title: Create AffirmationReview component with Like/Don't Like cards
description:
Create the new AffirmationReview component for FO-07 - the key new feature.

Files to create:
- 
Component requirements:
1. Props:
   - name: string
   - affirmations: string[] (20 affirmations)
   - summary: string (journey + affirmation types)
   - onComplete: (likedAffirmations: string[]) => void

2. UI Structure:
   - Summary section at top (purple background, like FO-06's step-ready.tsx)
   - Scrollable list of 20 affirmation cards
   - Continue button at END of list (not fixed)

3. Each card contains:
   - Affirmation text
   - Thumbs up button (Like) - grey initially, GREEN when selected
   - Thumbs down button (Don't Like) - grey initially, RED when selected
   - Use Lucide icons: ThumbsUp, ThumbsDown

4. State management:
   - Track rating for each card: 'liked' | 'disliked' | null
   - Continue button disabled until ALL 20 cards have a rating
   - Clicking a button toggles that selection (can change mind)

5. On Continue:
   - Filter affirmations to only those marked 'liked'
   - Call onComplete with the liked affirmations array

Style reference:
- Use similar styling to FO-04 components (Tailwind, purple theme)
- Cards should have subtle borders/shadows
- Thumbs up when selected: green-500 background
- Thumbs down when selected: red-500 background

⚠️ Do not close this tick until tsc compiles without errors.
